"I Will Survive" by Gloria Gaynor - This song is about overcoming adversity and persevering through hard times. It would be a great addition to a soundtrack that represents a person's resilience and determination.

"Roar" by Katy Perry - This song is about finding inner strength and standing up forself. It would be a great addition to a soundtrack that represents a person's journey towards self-discovery and empowerment.

"Eye of the Tiger" by Survivor - This song is about pushing through challenges and achieving success. It would be a great addition to a soundtrack that represents a person's drive and determination to succeed.

"Uptown Funk" by Mark Ronson ft. Bruno Mars - This song is about feeling good and living life to the fullest. It would be a great addition to a soundtrack that represents a person's sense of joy and happiness.

"The Power of Love" by Huey Lewis and the News - This song is about the strength and resilience of love. It would be a great addition to a soundtrack that represents a person's journey towards finding and maintaining healthy relationships.
